All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminAccountActivity
This class represents the Admin Account Dashboard activity
AttendanceListActivity
Activity for displaying the list of check ins' for a specific event.
Attendee
This class represents and Attendee user
AttendeeDashboardActivity
This class represents the Attendee's home dashboard activity
AttendeeNotifications
This class represents the Attendees Notifications page where an Attendee can see relevant information about the events they have signed up for
BrowseAllEvents
This class represents the Browse Events screen where an Attendee can browse all events in the future
BrowseEventAdapter
This class represents an Array Adapter which handles list views in Browse Events activities
BrowseMyEvent
This class represents the Browse Events screen where an Attendee can browse events they have signed up for
CaptureActivityPortraitMode
This class is needed for the QR Code Scanner activity
EditProfileActivity
This class represents the Edit Profile screen for an Attendee.
Event
Represents an event within the AttendEase application.
EventAdapter
This class represents a RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a list of events in either large or small card layouts.
EventAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item in the RecyclerView is clicked.
EventDetailsAttendee
This class represents the Event details screen where an attendee can view the details of an event and sign up or check in
EventDetailsOrganizer
Activity for displaying detailed information about a single event for organizers.
MainActivity
This class represents the First Screen where the user can choose which actor they wish to proceed as
Msg
 
MsgAdapter
 
MsgAdd
 
NewEventActivity
 
Organizer
Represents an event organizer with the capability to manage events.
OrganizerDashboardActivity
Represents the dashboard activity for event organizers in the AttendEase application.
OrganizerMyEventsActivity
This activity displays the list of events organized by the user.
OrganizerNotifications
 
QRScannerActivity
This class represents the QR Code Scanner screen that the user must use to check into an event
SignupsListActivity
Activity for displaying the list of sign-ups for a specific event.
UserCheckIn
Handles the check-in process for users in the AttendEase application.
ViewMsg
 
ViewMsgDialog
 
ViewMsgOrganizer
